Articles.Content:
So, I found out that 0.20 is out, and excitedly, I backed up my saves and then launched the game. When I opened it up, I was amazed at the loading screen, and then, it appeared the game stopped loading at this:

I know, I know. I shouldn't be surprised that a mod is not working in an alpha game, but I am just sad because several ships in my save have this part on them, including several parts of my base and my Mun station, and now they will be gone from my save.

Yes, I've had to change some of the cfg files to get them to work in the experimentals. C7 mentioned it during his progress update on the KSP weekily update: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content.php/172-KSP-Weekly-May-21-2013. Try that, hopefully that'll work! Good luck!
Aw, crap. I use Quantum Struts on my Interplanetary Tug Hopefully it will be ok.
Oh crap, I put a Quantum Fuel Transfer on every tank on every one of my ships... Hopefully it will update?
Quantum struts are working fine here, I don't use the fuel transfer though

Well, I did what the article said, but it didn't work.

I guess for now, I won't touch that save file and I'll just mess around in others.
